channel.title: NEW! -Simplicity BETA- Try us out!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/219cvgx.png[/img] [u][b]Welcome to Simplicity V2![/b][/u]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/1zx9ydt.png[/img][url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/74239750/Simplicity%20v1.1.rar]Play[/url] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2aeowp5.png[/img][url=http://simplicity317.com/]Forums[/url]
[u][b]Features:[/b][/u] + 100% Duel Arena (No bugs/glitches/dupes/ect) + Tons of minigames (Barbarian Assult, Castle Wars, Pest Control, ect) + Many bosses! (KBD, Kalphite Queen, GWD, and more!) + 100% SMOOTH, NO LAG gameplay! (24/7, of course) + 100% Quest Cape! (if new quest is added, cape is removed!) + Amazing, and flawless switching/pking! + SWEET Donator benefits. + Working & flawless Clan Chats! + Daily community updates & events! + 100% Bank Pin && Bank Pin Recovery! + Full Hunting + 100% CLUE SCROLLS with great rewards!
What are you waiting for? Get in on the action! [b]** ONLY FOR A SHORT AMOUNT OF TIME **[/b] [i]Join us TODAY on the forums & server to be put on the list for a recommended Staff! We are in current NEED of Staff members![/i] [b]** THATS NOT ALL! **[/b] [i]Also if you join right now since we are a new server & forum community we will be doing often drop parties! Come and gain the first rares in the game![/i]
[u][b]About us:[/b][/u] Simplicity is a server unlike the rest. You'll never experience any bugs or glitches. On top of that we don't just support one type of RSPS playing, such as skilling and/or Pking. We have BOTH. And instead of majoring in one (one being better than the other) they're both perfect! So what reason do you have not to join? Simplicity is a server where people can form a community with others and enjoy all the content we have to offer.
[i]Simplicity is a server that has been enjoyed by MANY! We need your help to help us become one of the biggest and most-boss server around![/i]
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/f9zyod9i3/image.png[/img] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/hfu9ivcyj/image.png[/img] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/t687095qz/image.png[/img] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/lerh1p1ln/image.png[/img] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/67bhhc9qz/image.png[/img] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/hky0sjk9n/image.png[/img] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/6mmracvob/image.png[/img] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/gl7pwu53v/image.png[/img] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/p4r3uldgb/image.png[/img][/center]

item.title: NEW! -Simplicity BETA- Try us out!
item.dc:creator: @Im_1ne Im 1ne
item.description:
@Im_1ne wrote:

[center]
Welcome to Simplicity V2!

Play
Forums

Features:

  • 100% Duel Arena (No bugs/glitches/dupes/ect)
  • Tons of minigames (Barbarian Assult, Castle Wars, Pest Control, ect)
  • Many bosses! (KBD, Kalphite Queen, GWD, and more!)
  • 100% SMOOTH, NO LAG gameplay! (24/7, of course)
  • 100% Quest Cape! (if new quest is added, cape is removed!)
  • Amazing, and flawless switching/pking!
  • SWEET Donator benefits.
  • Working & flawless Clan Chats!
  • Daily community updates & events!
  • 100% Bank Pin && Bank Pin Recovery!
  • Full Hunting
  • 100% CLUE SCROLLS with great rewards!

What are you waiting for? Get in on the action!
** ONLY FOR A SHORT AMOUNT OF TIME **
Join us TODAY on the forums & server to be put on the list for a recommended Staff!
We are in current NEED of Staff members!
** THATS NOT ALL! **
Also if you join right now since we are a new server & forum community
we will be doing often drop parties! Come and gain the first rares in the game!

About us: Simplicity is a server unlike the rest. You’ll never experience any bugs or glitches.
On top of that we don’t just support one type of RSPS playing, such as skilling and/or Pking. We have BOTH.
And instead of majoring in one (one being better than the other) they’re both perfect! So what reason do you
have not to join? Simplicity is a server where people can form a community with others and
enjoy all the content we have to offer.

Simplicity is a server that has been enjoyed by MANY! We need your help to help us become one
of the biggest and most-boss server around!
